algo.overview: For You feed = ML engagement prediction; open-source code; billions posts/day.

keyBoostsPenalties: Replies 13-27× likes; 2+ min dwell = 22× like boost
Verified + high TweepCred + healthy f/f ratio = big boost
algo.2025updates: Tighter toxicity for advertisers; favors focused topics, video, influencer tags; penalizes deleted posts/generic memes.

toxicity.def: Abusive/hateful/harmful content targeting protected categories or individuals; detected by Grok-powered ML; reduces visibility up to 80% or removal/suspension.

detection.tech: BERT/LSTM/XGBoost ensembles (85-91% acc), multi-modal (text+image+video), LLMs (ToxBuster), XAI explainability, real-time streaming.
detection.thresholds: >0.5 toxicity → filter; Grok safety score integrated.

toxicity.challenges: Sarcasm, implicit hate, slang evolution, bias mitigation, false positives.

enforcement.process: Hybrid AI+human review on reports; appeals available
